data.title: Air line, driving route, midpoint
data.meta_description: Shows the distance in kilometres between Dibrugarh and Silapathar and displays the route on an interactive map. Worldwide distance calculator with air line, route planner, travel duration and flight distances.
data.text:
Distance: 13.86 mi (22.31 km)

The shortest distance (air line) between Dibrugarh and Silapathar is 13.86 mi (22.31 km).

Driving route: -- ( - )

The shortest route between Dibrugarh and Silapathar is according to the route planner. The driving time is approx. . Half of the trip is reached in .

Bearing: 305.08° (NW)

The initial bearing on the course from Dibrugarh to Silapathar is 305.08° and the compass direction is NW.

Midpoint: 27.53678,94.81666

The geographic midpoint between Dibrugarh and Silapathar is in 6.93 mi (11.16 km) distance between both points in a bearing of 305.08°. It is located in India, Assam.

Time difference: 0h

Dibrugarh and Silapathar are both in the same time zone Asia/Kolkata.
